headline.main: Fight for a Mosul District Shows Iraqis' Slow, Painful Slog
headline.print_headline: Fight for a Mosul District Shows Iraqis' Slow, Painful Slog

docs.snippet: The Iraqi troops holding the front in eastern Mosul are perched inside bedrooms and kitchens of homes, on rooftops and in hallways. They haven't pushed forward in days. The water bottles and Styrofoam food containers they've used up pile around th...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Iraqi troops holding the front in eastern Mosul are perched inside bedrooms and kitchens of homes, on rooftops and in hallways. They haven't pushed forward in days. The water bottles and Styrofoam food containers they've used up pile around them, spilling into the houses' gardens.

headline.main: Deadly School Bus Crash Spurs 1 Company to Add Seat Belts
headline.print_headline: Deadly School Bus Crash Spurs 1 Company to Add Seat Belts

docs.snippet: A Tennessee company that operates buses for charter schools in Nashville says it plans to add seatbelts to its entire fleet in response to a fatal bus crash in Chattanooga that left six children dead....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Tennessee company that operates buses for charter schools in Nashville says it plans to add seatbelts to its entire fleet in response to a fatal bus crash in Chattanooga that left six children dead.

headline.main: Bernardi Joins Argentine First Division Coaching Exodus
headline.print_headline: Bernardi Joins Argentine First Division Coaching Exodus

docs.snippet: The Argentine merry-go-round of coaches continued as the first division went into a seven-week summer recess on Monday with Arsenal's Lucas Bernardi quitting after five matches in charge....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Argentine merry-go-round of coaches continued as the first division went into a seven-week summer recess on Monday with Arsenal's Lucas Bernardi quitting after five matches in charge.

headline.main: GM to Temporarily Close 5 Factories as Car Inventory Builds
headline.print_headline: GM to Temporarily Close 5 Factories as Car Inventory Builds

docs.snippet: General Motors will temporarily close five factories next month as it tries to reduce a growing inventory of cars on dealer lots....

headline.main: Vale of Brazil Sells Fertilizer Business to Mosaic for $2.5 Billion
headline.print_headline: Vale Sells Fertilizer Business to Mosaic

docs.snippet: For Minnesota-based Mosaic, the deal gives it a foothold in Latin America’s largest economy, which boasts a strong agriculture sector....
docs.abstract: Brazilian mining conglomerate Vale agrees to sell much of its fertilizer assets to Mosaic Company for $2.5 billion.
docs.lead_paragraph: For Minnesota-based Mosaic, the deal gives it a foothold in Latin America’s largest economy, which boasts a strong agriculture sector.

headline.main: Feds: Lobster Captain Who Lost 2 at Sea Was Drinking, High
headline.print_headline: Feds: Lobster Captain Who Lost 2 at Sea Was Drinking, High

docs.snippet: A Maine lobster boat owner had been drinking and using marijuana and oxycodone before he lost two crew members during a 2014 fishing trip, federal prosecutors said Monday in charging him with seaman's manslaughter....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Maine lobster boat owner had been drinking and using marijuana and oxycodone before he lost two crew members during a 2014 fishing trip, federal prosecutors said Monday in charging him with seaman's manslaughter.

headline.main: Barcelona Withdraw Appeal Over Fines for Pro-Catalan Flags
headline.print_headline: Barcelona Withdraw Appeal Over Fines for Pro-Catalan Flags

docs.snippet: Barcelona have agreed to withdraw an appeal against fines imposed by UEFA last year after their supporters waved pro-Catalan independence flags at two matches, European soccer's governing body said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona have agreed to withdraw an appeal against fines imposed by UEFA last year after their supporters waved pro-Catalan independence flags at two matches, European soccer's governing body said on Monday.

headline.main: Fed's Yellen Trumpets Education in Changing Economy
headline.print_headline: Fed's Yellen Trumpets Education in Changing Economy

docs.snippet: Changing technologies and globalization have put a premium on completing a college education in order to get and keep higher-paying jobs, Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Changing technologies and globalization have put a premium on completing a college education in order to get and keep higher-paying jobs, Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen said on Monday.
